tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE gaming_accessory_orders (
 order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 accessory_name VARCHAR(50),
 order_date DATE,
 delivery_address VARCHAR(100),
 delivery_status VARCHAR(20) 
);

CREATE TABLE delivery_status (
    delivery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    delivery_date DATE,
    delivery_person VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE AccessoryOrders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name TEXT,
    customer_name TEXT,
    order_date DATE,
    delivery_status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ShippingCompanies (
    company_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name TEXT,
    contact_person TEXT,
    contact_email TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE DeliveryStatusLog (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id INT,
    status TEXT,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE shipping_orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    accessory_name VARCHAR(50),
    customer_id INT,
    order_date DATE,
    delivery_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE order_details (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    accessory_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES shipping_orders (order_id)
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
 order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 customer_id INT,
 product_name VARCHAR(255),
 order_date TIMESTAMP,
 status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
 customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 customer_name VARCHAR(255),
 email VARCHAR(255),
 phone_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE products (
 product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 product_name VARCHAR(255),
 description TEXT,
 price DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE shipments (
 shipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 order_id INT,
 shipping_date DATE,
 delivery_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE tracking_status (
 tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 shipment_id INT,
 status VARCHAR(50),
 update_date TIMESTAMP
)
